originalText.text: I had the most wonderful experience working with Shreya to purchase jewelry for my wedding events. Went over to her NYC apartment with my mom and aunt, and was greeted with the best energy. The range and style of product Deva provides is amazing. The quality and design is so different and well done. Ended up buying 3 different jewelry sets, one of them being my wedding ceremony set. I felt so comfortable and beautiful in the products. I‚Äôm a big believer in the experience and value of a product, Deva checked all the boxes for me. I have been and will continue to recommend Deva to all my friends and family.

originalText.text: The designer and owned was super helpful and had a wide array of styles! I needed to buy some pieces for a wedding while just in New York for a few hours and she helped me make it happen! And all the pieces are beautiful. Highly recommend!
